title: Trace ethylene carbonate-mediated low-concentration ether-based electrolytes for high-voltage lithium metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,5613-5626
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01831A, Paper
Yinghua Chen, Zheng Ma, Yuqi Wang, Pushpendra Kumar, Fei Zhao, Tao Cai, Zhen Cao, Luigi Cavallo, Haoran Cheng, Qian Li, Jun Ming
A solubilization and stabilization effect of trace ethylene carbonate solvent assisted by the varied molecule-ion interaction was discovered in ether-based electrolyte, enabling the 80 Î¼m Li || LiNi0.8Co0.1Mn0.1O2 full-cell operate at 4.5 V stably.
